item.title: 特朗普团队寻求加强拜登对中国的芯片控制
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府正在勾画更严厉的美国半导体限制措施，并向主要盟国施压，要求它们加强对中国芯片业的限制，这是美国新总统计划扩大乔-拜登（Joe Biden）时期开始的限制中国政府技术实力的努力的早期迹象。【原文：Donald Trump’s administration is sketching out tougher versions of US semiconductor curbs and pressuring key allies to escalate their restrictions on China’s chip industry, an early indication the new US president plans to expand efforts that began under Joe Biden to limit Beijing’s technological prowess.】

item.title: 伍德赛德公司表示，碳信用额是遏制排放的必要条件
item.description: 伍德赛德能源集团有限公司（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）认为碳信用额仍可发挥作用，因为解决难以消减的排放预计需要成本。【原文：Woodside Energy Group Ltd. sees a continued role for carbon credits because of the projected costs of tackling difficult-to-abate emissions.】

item.title: 韩国做空禁令即将结束，Pictet 考虑采取多空策略
item.description: 一旦韩国按计划恢复卖空，Pictet 资产管理公司就计划买入更多韩国股票，以对冲其股票多头头寸。【原文：Pictet Asset Management plans to buy more South Korean stocks once a planned resumption of short-selling in the nation allows it to hedge its long equity positions.】

item.title: 特朗普命令引发地缘政治风险，中国科技股暴跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普采取行动进一步挤压美国对亚洲国家的投资后，中国科技股出现下滑，这表明世界上最大的两个经济体之间的金融和技术脱钩正在加深。【原文：Chinese technology stocks slumped after President Donald Trump moved to further squeeze US investments into the Asian nation, in a sign of deepening financial and technological decoupling between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 希尔豪斯寻求为床垫制造商的 8 亿美元贷款再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Hillhouse 投资公司正在与银行洽谈，为其收购中国床垫制造商 AI Dream 的 8 亿美元贷款进行再融资。【原文：Hillhouse Investment is in talks with banks to refinance an $800 million loan that backed its acquisition of Chinese mattress maker AI Dream, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼债券计划引发对治理和货币化的担忧
item.description: 印尼银行计划购买政府发行的债券，为其雄心勃勃的住房计划提供资金，这引发了人们对国家债务管理的更多担忧。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s plan to buy bonds that will be issued by the government to fund its ambitious housing program is raising more concerns over the nation’s debt governance.】

item.title: 特朗普关税阴影笼罩，韩国银行降息提振需求
item.description: 韩国央行下调基准利率，以支持因政治动荡和唐纳德-特朗普关税计划的贸易影响而受到威胁的经济，此举受到广泛期待。【原文：The Bank of Korea cut its benchmark interest rate in a widely expected move to support an economy jolted by political turmoil and threatened by the trade impact of Donald Trump’s tariff plans.】

item.title: 苹果公司高管作证称应用商店收费可能违反法院命令
item.description: 苹果公司的一位高级管理人员作证说，苹果公司认为，当它为移动应用开发者的购买行为增加新的佣金时，存在着 "极大 "的风险，即苹果公司将无法遵守法院的命令，允许移动应用开发者引导客户使用该公司应用商店以外的支付方式。【原文：Apple Inc. believed there was a “significant” risk it would fail to comply with a court order to allow mobile app developers to steer customers to payment methods outside the company’s App Store when it added a new commission for those purchases, a senior company executive testified.】

item.title: 黄金因降息希望和避险需求增长而接近历史纪录
item.description: 由于市场对美联储最早将于 7 月再次降息的信心不断增强，同时特朗普政府对中国的最新贸易炮火也刺激了避险需求，黄金保持在最新纪录附近。【原文：Gold held near its latest record as confidence grows the Federal Reserve will implement another rate cut as early as July, while the Trump administration’s latest trade salvos against China bolstered haven demand.】

item.title: 巴菲特寻求增持股份，日本贸易公司大涨
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Japanese trading houses, including Mitsubishi Corp. and Marubeni Corp., rallied on Tuesday after Berkshire Hathaway Inc. said it was looking to increase ownership in the companies.】

item.title: 中国风险投资公司欲贷款 4 亿美元收购摇滚偶像马歇尔公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国风险投资公司洪山资本集团正在与银行谈判，以获得约 4 亿美元的贷款，支持其收购音响设备制造商 Marshall Group AB。【原文：Chinese venture capital firm HongShan Capital Group is in talks with banks for an around $400 million loan to back its acquisition of audio equipment maker Marshall Group AB, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 错过纳税截止日期的英国购房者将额外支付高达 11,250 英镑的税款
item.description: 据一份新的报告称，数以万计正在购房的英国人将错过一个关键的纳税期限，一些首次购房者将面临高达 11,250 英镑（14,226 美元）的额外费用。【原文：Tens of thousands of Britons currently in the process of purchasing a home are on course to miss a key tax deadline, with some first-time buyers facing up to £11,250 ($14,226) in extra charges, according to a new report.】

item.title: 香港将在财政预算案中应对赤字和经济增长放缓问题
item.description: 香港官员本周将公布如何解决亚洲金融之都面临的日益严峻挑战的计划，其中最主要的挑战是增长放缓和二十年来最长的连续财政赤字。【原文：Hong Kong officials this week will unveil plans on how they’ll solve the mounting challenges facing Asia’s financial capital — chief among them slower growth and the longest string of fiscal deficits in two decades.】

item.title: 中国石油茶壶受税收规定影响面临关闭威胁
item.description: 中国规模较小的独立炼油厂正受到更严格的税收制度的挤压，这可能会加速这一陷入困境的行业的停产。【原文：China’s smaller, independent oil refineries are getting squeezed by a stricter tax regime, which could accelerate shutdowns in the embattled sector.】

item.title: 汉堡王、大力水手加盟商因现金枯竭获得债务帮助
item.description: 据知情人士透露，经营快餐连锁店汉堡王（Burger King）和大力水手路易斯安那厨房（Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen）网络的GPS Hospitality LLC公司正在与顾问商讨如何在收入逆风的情况下管理日益减少的现金。【原文：GPS Hospitality LLC, which operates networks of fast-food chains Burger King and Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen, is huddling with advisers about how to manage a shrinking cash pile amid revenue headwinds, according to people with knowledge of the discussions.】

item.title: 风险投资公司支持的 Prisma 为潜在退出与摩根士丹利合作
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Advent 正在探索各种方案，包括可能对总部位于阿根廷的支付公司 Prisma Medios de Pago 进行首次公开募股，估值高达 50 亿美元。【原文：Private equity firm Advent is exploring options including a possible initial public offering for Argentina-based payments company Prisma Medios de Pago at a valuation of as much as $5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国对伊朗实施新制裁，原油市场震荡，石油上涨
item.description: 在特朗普政府对伊朗石油流动实施新制裁后，石油延续涨势，称此举是对德黑兰恢复最大施压战略。【原文：Oil extended a gain after the Trump administration imposed new sanctions on flows of Iranian oil, framing the move as a return to a strategy of maximum pressure against Tehran.】

item.title: 中国主动型股票基金在科技股上涨中击败指数追随者
item.description: 中国的主动管理型股票基金在科技股大涨的背景下表现优于指数型基金，重新成为市场关注的焦点。【原文：China’s actively managed equities funds have returned to the limelight, outperforming their index-tracking peers in a tech-driven rally.】

item.title: 中国捍卫货币对大型银行和债券基金造成影响
item.description: 中国通过扼杀本地流动性来捍卫本国货币的策略正在整个金融体系激起涟漪，挤压银行，加剧债券基金的损失。【原文：China’s strategy of defending its currency by choking local liquidity is sending ripples throughout the financial system, squeezing banks and fueling losses at bond funds.】

item.title: 伍德赛德公司净利润增长一倍多，产量创历史新高
item.description: 伍德赛德能源集团（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）的净收入翻了一番多，因为这家澳大利亚液化天然气生产商的产量达到了创纪录的水平。【原文：Woodside Energy Group Ltd.’s net income more than doubled as the Australian liquefied natural gas producer’s output rose to a record.】

item.title: 美国向中国施压，亚洲股市注定下跌：市场综述
item.description: 受华尔街盘中表现不佳以及特朗普政府遏制美国对华贸易的最新举措的拖累，整个亚洲地区的股市将出现大幅下跌。【原文：Asian stocks are poised for hefty losses throughout the region, dragged by a poor session on Wall Street and the Trump administration’s latest moves to curb US trade with China.】

item.title: Chegg起诉Alphabet，称谷歌人工智能引发商业评论
item.description: Chegg公司正在权衡其业务的 "战略替代方案"，称谷歌推出人工智能摘要工具后，其网络教育平台的流量已经锐减。【原文：Chegg Inc. is weighing “strategic alternatives” for its business, saying that traffic to its web-based education platform has been decimated following Google’s launch of an artificial intelligence-powered summary tool.】

item.title: Anthropic 预计新一轮估值将达 615 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，人工智能初创公司Anthropic即将达成一项交易，以615亿美元的估值融资35亿美元。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise $3.5 billion at a valuation of $61.5 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter — a larger funding round than the company initially planned to raise.】

item.title: 加拿大央行下调存款利率似乎能缓解回购市场压力
item.description: 加拿大央行的一位官员表示，央行最近对其存款利率设定方式的改变正在改善货币市场的运作，降低借贷成本。【原文：A Bank of Canada official said a recent change in how the central bank sets its deposit rate is working to improve the functioning of money markets, lowering borrowing costs.】

item.title: 债券市场并不完全买马斯克的 DOGE 所卖的东西
item.description:

item.title: 投资者批评 TFI 迁往美国后，TFI 将继续留在加拿大
item.description: TFI International Inc. 不会将总部迁往美国，称将 "根据迄今收到的股东反馈 "保留其加拿大公司的地位。【原文：TFI International Inc. won’t move its headquarters to the US, saying it will retain its Canadian corporation status “based on feedback from shareholders received to date.”】

item.title: 肯-格里芬为朱莉娅-科赫的公园大道合作公寓支付 4,500 万美元
item.description: 亿万富翁肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）又添一处豪宅，在曼哈顿最高档的合作公寓楼之一买下了一套公寓。【原文：Billionaire Ken Griffin has added another luxury home to his collection, buying an apartment in one of Manhattan’s most exclusive co-op buildings.】

item.title: 禽流感使美国鸡群数量锐减，产蛋鸡数量创九年新低
item.description: 由于禽流感导致数百万只家禽死亡，1 月份美国的蛋鸡数量降至 2016 年以来的最低水平，鸡蛋价格也因此创下历史新高。【原文：America’s flock of egg-laying hens dropped to the lowest since 2016 in January as avian influenza resulted in the death of millions of birds, driving egg prices to record levels.】

item.title: Zoom 前景黯淡，表明新产品回报缓慢
item.description: Zoom Communications Inc. 预计今年的收入增长将低于预期，这使人们对扩大产品套件将带来销售激增的乐观情绪变得暗淡。【原文：Zoom Communications Inc. projected worse-than-expected revenue growth for the year, dimming optimism that an expanded suite of products will bring a sales surge.】

item.title: 资金外流 1200 亿美元后，Wamco 任命四名副首席信息官
item.description: 西方资产管理公司（Western Asset Management Co.【原文：Western Asset Management Co. named four deputy chief investment officers, seeking to emphasize a “team-based approach” in the aftermath of criminal fraud charges against the bond manager’s former star trader and veteran Ken Leech.】
